= Simple Insert Juice Extension =

Extension to insert a simple element in to a page

Author: *Richard Wallis*<br/>
Juice Version: > 0.2

== Operation ==

Upon construction this extension inserts the passed insert in to the page.

== Example code ==
{{{
var div = '<div id="extendedBy" style="display: block; width: 100%; text-align: center;">' +
	'Extended by <a href="http://juice-project.googlecode.com">The Juice Project</a></div>';
var insert = new JuiceInsert(div,"body","append");
new simpleInsertJuice(juice,insert);	
}}}

== Prerequisites ==
=== Loaded modules ==
{{{juice.loadJs("http://{MyServer}/extensions/JuiceSimpleInsert.js");}}}

=== Data requirements ===

None
== Constructor arguments ==
{{{simpleInsertJuice(ju,insert)}}}<br/>
arg: ju - instance of juice <br/>
arg: insert - JuiceInsert for page<br/>
